subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan, the world’s pre-eminent doubles team, rallied from a slow start to defeat Marcelo Melo and Ivan Dodig, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4.
snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan, the world’s pre-eminent doubles team, rallied from a slow start to defeat Marcelo Melo and Ivan Dodig, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, 6-4.
